Class RoomService

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoomService

  • public class RoomService
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Room Service added to the Menu. This Menu item can be ordered by guest.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Li Jin Quan, Lee Jian Hao, Chen Xing Yu, Kok Jia Hui

        RoomService Constructor.
        Parameters:
        no - The room No of the room which the MenuItem order will be delivered to
        menuItemNo - The number of MenuItem ordered
        quantity - The quantity of the MenuItem ordered
        remarks - Any special instruction for the MenuItem order
        price - The price of the MenuItem ordered
        status - The Status of the MenuItem ordered
